item.description:
How about a fun day with lots of activity options (see below!) in beautiful Westford! We would be among other meetup group members also! This is copied from the Cards & Conversation meetup:

It's Summertime! Come and join us for a day of outside fun at Kimball Farm in Westford. Easy to find off of Rt 495, Kimball offers something for everyone of all ages. If you like mini-golf, you will have a hard time choosing between the 2 courses! The Bumper Boats? Well, I can only guess that a few of you will opt to try this to cool off and/or chase your meetup friends into the waterfall.

Purchase tickets to individual activities, or pay $30 for any combination of the following 5:

* 1 round of Waterfall Run mini golf
* 1 round of Forbidden Mine mini golf
* Bucket of balls at the Driving Range
* Round of 9-hole Pitch & Putt (Counts as two activities)
* Bumper Boat ride
* 1 regular ice cream, frappe or regular sundae
* 1 $6 Play Card good at the Olde Sawmill Midway
* 1 Balloon Ride (Counts as two activities)
* 1 Admission to Animal Adventures
* 2 Tokens for Grand Slam Batting Cages

The Grill n' Seafood Shack offers a chance to relax in between activites. And the ice cream is to die for!!!

HOW TO GET THERE

* From the south, take Rt 128/95 N to exit 29B. Turn left at Concord Turnpike/MA-2. At the traffic circle, take the 2nd exit onto Elm St/MA-119 W/Massachusetts 2A W. Turn right at King St/MA-110 E. Kimball Farms will be on the right.


This event will be canceled in the case of rain.
item.name: Fun activities at Kimball Farm in Westford! Mini golf, bumper boats, MORE!
